question: Which ministry issues the certification for the Pariksha Pe Charcha program that was recently rescheduled?
option1: Ministry of Human Resource and Development
option4: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
answer: Ministry of Human Resource and Development
explanation: Pariksha Pe Charcha was introduced in 2018. The 2020 contest is going to be the 3<sup>rd</sup> edition of this program. The certificates of participation are issued by the Ministry of Human Resource and Development. The student winners get the chance to interact with the Prime Minister and ask questions related to exams.
